title: 285 - 6 Things You Can Do To Unlock Your Creative Super Self
description:

SPONSORS

SKILLSHARE X CREATIVE PEP TALK
Our first ever online video course is out now on SKILLSHARE!

Are you looking for your next big break? Whether you’ve NEVER had a big break in your creative career OR you’re a veteran creative who needs a new big break to reinvent yourself: this class is for you!!! Go to https://www.skillshare.com/r/profile/Andy-J.-Pizza/2832678 to get started!!!

SHUTTERSTOCK
Shutterstock has MILLIONS of high quality stock vectors, photos, illustrations and more! Check them out here: shutterstock.com/explore/creativepeptalk

WIREFRAME PODCAST FROM ADOBE
Wireframe is a podcast for designer’s and design curious creatives.

Whether you’re into UX, UI, technology... or just curious about the way design impacts our everyday lives, check out Adobe’s Wireframe Podcast NOW! https://link.chtbl.com/wireframe?sid=podcast.creativepeptalk
author: andy@andy-j-miller.com (andy j pizza, alex sugg, jordan aaron, yoni wolf)

itunes:title: 285 - 6 Things You Can Do To Unlock Your Creative Super Self
itunes:author: andy j pizza, alex sugg, jordan aaron, yoni wolf
itunes:summary:
Your best creative work will flow out of you being your best you. This episode is a checklist of creative self care practices that you may be neglecting, will actually really WANT to do, but may be completely missing out on!

The ideas in this episode have made a world a difference in my practice as of late, and I think they will do the same for you!

We cover:
- Finding Your POWER HOUR
- Finding Your PLACE OF POWER
- A Meditative Exercise that will Fill You With Motivation
- Flow State Tips

MUCH MORE!!
